channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 24th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different over tree roots 3000x1000x30mm tarmac patch stats required number 1 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 24th September
item.description:
Branch hanging down, it looks like part of the tree is dead and it looks like they could fall. quater of the tree looks green and the other quater looks dead.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken branches and the canopy is too large and spreading, also affecting the telecoms cables which run through it., 24th September
item.description:
The tree is outside number 11 on the roadside verge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Linden Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
